title: Start
body:
<<faceRight Mia>>
<<faceRight Renata>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceRight Mia>>
<<faceRight Renata>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
Mia: Where are we?
Renata: These look like bars.
Mia: Was Roundier Haia in a hurry to get a drink?
Renata: No, but he definitely came through here.
Mia: Let's see if there's anywhere else here he could have gone.
[[end]]
